title._content: Freight train with two helper engines climbing the steep grade of Cajon Pass (westbound), Cajon, Calif.  (LOC)

description._content: Delano, Jack,, photographer. Freight train with two helper engines climbing the steep grade of Cajon Pass (westbound), Cajon, Calif. 1943 March 1 transparency : color. Notes: Title from FSA or OWI agency caption. Transfer from U.S. Office of War Information, 1944. Subjects: Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railroad World War, 1939-1945 Mountain railroads Mountains Passes (Landforms) Cajon Pass (Calif.) San Bernardino Mountains (Calif.) United States--California--Cajon Format: Transparencies--Color Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
